sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: Trusted Platform Module (TPM) is a cryptoprocessor that secures hardware by using cryptographic keys. For developers who use TMP to develop security features, a software TPM emulator is a convenient solution. Compared to a hardware TPM device, the emulator has no limit for quests that can access it. Also, it is simple to switch between versions TPM 1.2 and TPM 2.0. &qemu; has support for the software TPM emulator that is included in the swtpm package.
